item.title: Report X-2024091289
item.description:
Report X-2024091289

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-23T09:15:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-13
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN TRAILER #94 ON UNLOAD. PACKAGE WAS SET ASIDE UNTIL TRAILER WAS EMPTY. RESPONDERS WERE CALLED. DESIGNATED RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND HAZMAT ON ITS OWN INSIDE AN EMPTY TRAILER. HAZMAT WAS BROUGHT TO CLERKS FOR PROCESSING. HAZMAT WAS IDENTIFIED AND PROCESSED THROUGH DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024091290
item.description:
Report X-2024091290

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-23T09:15:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-13
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO WET BOX THAT HAD OXIDIZER 5.1 AND CORROSIVE 8 DIAMOND HAZARD LABELS AND WAS WET UPON RETURNIG TO PROCESSING CENTER. OPENING DISCOVERED 4 ONE GALLON PLASTIC CONTAINERS OF MINNCARE HD DISINFECTANT ONE CAP WAS COMPETELY OFF BOTTLE AND APPRX. 96 OUNCE OF LIQUID WERE GONE THERE WER CORRUGATE PARTITIONS IN BOX SEPERATING BOTTLES.

item.title: Report X-2024091338
item.description:
Report X-2024091338

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-23T09:15:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-10
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: EMPLOYEE PICKED UP WET BOX UPON OPENING DISCOVERED UN 2800 WET NON-SPILLABLE,ELECTRIC STORAGE BATTERY INSIDE THAT LEAKED APPROX. 2 OZ. OF LIQUID PACKED WITH FOAM IN A BAG NO OUTER MARKINGS ON BOX INDICATING "NON-SPILLABLE BATTERT" LEADING ME TO BELIEVE THIS IS AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT.
